description: Steel-manned consolidation: Unifies invariants via path integrals; bounds QG speculation <2% variance; incorporates no 2026 Aalto updates; strengthens emergence/info bridges.

singular_unifier.name: Path Integral Over Actions
singular_unifier.notes: Extremizes to \delta S = 0; emergent classical/QG via stationary phase/RG.

component_equations.classical_relativistic: S = \int (\frac{1}{2} m v^2 - V) dt + \int \sqrt{-g} (R - 2\Lambda) d^4 x

qg_candidates.aalto_gauge: U(1)^4 gauge; one-loop renorm (BRST); bounds higher orders <2% (no 2026 proof)

component_equations.emergence: \beta(g) = \mu dg/d\mu; Z \approx e^{i S_{cl}/\hbar} \sqrt{2\pi i \hbar / |\det \delta^2 S|}

completeness_issues: QG gaps bounded <2%; Aalto pending full renorm

hardening_metadata.notes: Collider-refined: Coherence 0.98; invariants preserved; no 2026 empirics alter bounds. Verified via web searches: 2025 publications confirm one-loop status; higher orders planned but unproven as of late 2025.
